snippet.title: Sheeplings: First steps in a digital world
snippet.description:
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/de/app/sheeplings/id1591413139
Android: coming real soon...

Sheeplings offers children a gentle and safe introduction to smartphones and tablets. You can set the playtime.

In the game, children follow a day in a sheep pasture. They can interact with the animals and the landscape using touch gestures. There is no predefined gameplay.

After the specified play time, the day comes to an end and the sheep go to sleep. The possibilities for interaction come to a comprehensible end. This makes it easier for your child to disengage from the device and the media experience after use.

Sheeplings consistently implements media pedagogical aspects in the context of media education and media literacy. This allows children to try out and learn how to use digital devices without pressure or excessive demands, while experiencing limits on time and content.

The gameplay avoids overtaxing elements:
- No predefined game goals
- No time-critical tasks
- No point systems

Of course, the app complies with the basics of youth protection:
- No in-game advertising
- No data collection
- No additional purchases
- No depiction of violent, sexualized or discriminatory content

https://www.explorlings.com/sheeplings

Explorlings is a small studio from Hamburg with big goals:
Developing apps for a responsible and gentle introduction of children to the world of digital devices.

https://www.explorlings.com
